content.description: A <math alttext="95" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>95</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent confidence interval for the proportion of parents who use parental controls for blocking, filtering, or monitoring their teenagersâ€™ online activities is <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.36 comma 0.42, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>(</mo><mn>0.36</mn><mo>,</mo><mpadded><mn>0.42</mn></mpadded><mo>)</mo></math>.
content.question: Which of the following could be a <math alttext="99" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>99</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent confidence interval based on the same data?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.30 comma 0.38, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.30</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0.38</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.35 comma 0.43, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.35</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0.43</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.36 comma 0.48, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>(</mo><mn>0.36</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0.48</mn><mo>)</mo></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.37 comma 0.41, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.37</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0.41</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.40 comma 0.41, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.40</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0.41</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0.35 comma 0.43, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0.35</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>0.43</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.3: Justifying a Claim Based on a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Make an appropriate claim or draw an appropriate conclusion.
